whyChoose.heading: Why Choose Us?
whyChoose.experienceDesc: Over 20 years in tire retreading for heavy equipment and transport vehicles, delivering reliable results.
whyChoose.italianTechDesc: We use advanced machinery imported from Italy and rely on expert Italian training for our technicians.
whyChoose.costSavingsDesc: Our retreading solutions help clients significantly reduce operational costs compared to buying new tires.
whyChoose.environmentDesc: We protect the environment by recycling used tires and reintegrating them into production, reducing waste and pollution.
whyChoose.qualityDesc: We use premium raw materials and strict quality control to ensure durable and safe retreaded tires.
whyChoose.fastTurnaroundDesc: Efficient processes mean quicker delivery times, minimizing equipment downtime for our clients.

yearsExperience.heading: Years of Industry Experience
yearsExperience.desc: The tire retreading industry has existed in Europe and America for over 75 years, and we bring this legacy of expertise to our operations.

aboutUsPage.heading: About Us
aboutUsPage.subheading: Founded in 2004, the Egyptian Italian Company specializes in retreading tires for heavy equipment and heavy transport. We combine Italian expertise with the latest technology to deliver cost-effective and environmentally friendly solutions.
aboutUsPage.storyText: The tire retreading industry began in Europe and America more than 75 years ago. The Egyptian Italian Company is an Egyptian joint-stock company specialized in retreading tires for heavy equipment and heavy transport vehicles of all kinds. It was established in 2004. Our company works on equipping and retreading tires using the latest and best technologies available in the industry through high-quality raw materials. The company also offers a unique service for repairing all types of tire damages, such as punctures, cracks, and cuts, carried out by engineers and technicians working at the highest level and using the latest global technologies, machines, tools, and materials from the best international companies. This ensures the highest possible efficiency of retreaded tires and faster delivery times, which helps reduce operating costs, contributes to environmental protection on one hand, and reintegrates used tires into the production cycle on the other. The Italian company for tire retreading imported the factory's specialized equipment from Italy and also relied on Italian experts to train and qualify technicians in this field.
aboutUsPage.missionText: To deliver reliable, innovative, and environmentally responsible tire retreading services that help our clients reduce costs and minimize environmental impact.
aboutUsPage.visionText: To be the leading provider of tire retreading solutions in Egypt and the region, recognized for our quality, technology, and commitment to sustainability.

values.title: Quality
values.desc: We ensure the highest standards in every retreaded tire through strict quality control and premium materials.

values.title: Innovation
values.desc: We continuously adopt the latest technology and methods to deliver superior results.

values.title: Sustainability
values.desc: We are committed to protecting the environment by extending tire life and reducing waste.

values.title: Partnership
values.desc: We build long-term relationships with our clients, partners, and community based on trust and mutual success.
